fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Research and innovation, Food Safety, Climate Action
inter_groups:
A member of the professional beekeepers associations, they feed into Eu legislation 
Currently involved with a Horizon 2020 proposal with a number of other Eu institutions regarding beehealth ( Poshbee proposal)
eu_initiatives:
Bee health issues  
Spraying and pesticide issues 
Cap reforms that affect our pollinators ( negatively)

relevant_communication:
We have a monthly magazine to our beekeepers  
Yearly internationally renowned summer school for beekeepers 
We send the best of our honey to the UK honey show to represent Ireland , this year alone we brought home 84 prize cards
goals__remit:
Non for profit company representing the associations of beekeepers in Ireland . We have 3500 members across Ireland . We run a summer school for our beekeepers and promote education of our beekeeper through running , beginners courses, study groups , exam system , beehealth workshops.   
We raise bee health issues for our beekeepers at national level and issues over medications when they arise.
